channel.title: No page for El Diablo Supreme

item.title: Re: No page for El Diablo Supreme
(no title)
item.content:encoded: What happens if you win a fight?

item.title: No page for El Diablo Supreme
item.content:encoded:
I've recently discovered there was a link to El Diablo Supreme in a very highly upgraded village and I found there wasn't a page on it. So I though it might be good for one to be made. This area first appeared when I had -2 stamina.
The page had the following text:

El Diablo Supreme

You walk into the roaring lucha arena, and see a huge crowd cheering at some weirdo in the center ring, with a silly mask and a microphone (he looks a lot like the guy who stands on the Crank, now that you think of it)..

"Does anyone have the courage to face.."
the crowd joins in, saying the rest together with the man..
El Diablo Supreme?"

You survey your surroundings..

(If you have 1 to 9 Stamina remaining, you may spend it here once a day, in the Lucha Ring, readying yourself to fight El Diablo Supreme. If he points you out, you get a chance to use all your training to wrestle El Diablo Supreme - if you win, you get 100 Stamina. If you lose, however, all your training goes to waste. The people who've beaten El Diablo Supreme within the past 24 hours are listed in the Desfile de los Técnicos below)

Current Training Level: 3
Last Win: Never!
Days until next lucha: 9
Stamina: 0

— Training —
Already Trained today!

— Lucha —
Now is not the time, luchador..

— Desfile de los Técnicos —

Edit: Just realised that this was a recent addition
